GSD.description:
KVM: Don't null dereference ops->destroy

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.134 by commit 3616776bc51cd3262bb1be60cc01c72e0a1959cf. For more details please see the references link.
